This MOD does NOT Re-Place BASIC SKYRIM MUSIC (I actually LUV SkyRim's Music - LOL); it only ADDS over 3-HRS of Original-Music that will Play-Randomly throughout the following, depending on the Original-Music's STYLE (Dramatic/Romantic/Comedic ~ approx. 75% Lore-Friendly/25% NON-LF):

COMBAT
TAVERNS
HOMES
TOWNS
DUNGEONS
CASTLES
EXPLORING
